name: BlackGaogamon
description: BlackGaogamon resembles a large black Akita Inu dog with black nose and claws, fangs, yellow eyes, a gray belly, thick gold mane with braids, gray tail tip, feet tips, snout, inner ears, and a yellow cross-shaped mark in the forehead. It wears black belts and red and black boxing gloves on its front paws with its claws piercing through the gloves, white bandages on its legs, and black ribbons on its back.
